// Lines starting with // will be skipped
// Tile data for map, using numbers from the Tile Enum
// Disabled = 0; Unreachable tiles
// Floor = 1; A passable tile
// HomeDoor = 2; Only ghosts can pass this tile
// HomeInterior = 3; Ghost only home
// Intersection = 4; Ghosts make a decision when one tile from an intersection
// Restricted = 5; Ghosts can't turn up when restricted
// Teleport = 6; Teleport the player/ghost if they're on this tile
// Tunnel = 7; Ghosts slow down in the tunnel
// Wall = 8
